rule: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long
Employees must change passwords every 90 days
Confidential data should be encrypted at rest and in transit
Employees must not share login credentials
Access to sensitive systems requires manager approval
All software must be approved by IT
Employees must report security incidents within 24 hours
Company devices must have antivirus installed
Internet usage must comply with acceptable use policy
Personal devices must not connect to internal networks without permission
All user activity logs must be retained for at least 90 days
Data backups must be performed weekly
Sensitive files must not be emailed outside the company
Employees must complete annual security training
